title: Bug 20495New Required PlugIn  list not sorted
description: Bug 20495New Required PlugInlist not sorted (Note that I have the preference set to show the internal plugin names (e.g.com.ibm.etools.xml.utility)).
OB: Build F3If you add a new plugin as a required plugin, the list which appears in theprompter is not sorted.This makes it nearly impossible to find the plugin I want, since my list isnearly 500 elements long.
SR: Build F3If you add a new plugin as a required plugin, the list which appears in theprompter is not sorted.This makes it nearly impossible to find the plugin I want, since my list isnearly 500 elements long.
